description.value: If the spine of Vlaakith takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn't function until the end of its next turn.

Fear

Aura 2

Enemies within the aura take a -2 penalty to attack rolls.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+27 vs AC; 3d6 + 8 necrotic damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

+20 vs Fortitude; 1d6 + 8 necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

Ranged 5

+25 vs Fortitude; the target is dazed and restrained (save ends both). First Failed Saving Throw: The target is instead stunned and restrained (save ends both). Second Failed Saving Throw: The target dies, and its soul is trapped in one of the spine's soul gems until the spine is destroyed; see also consume soul.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Minor, At-Will

Ranged 20

+25 vs Fortitude; the target takes ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

The spine of Vlaakith makes a shadow ray attack and a immobilizing ray attack.

At-Will ✦ Fear, Necrotic

Immediate Reaction

Close burst 5

Trigger: When a creature fails a saving throw against drain soul, at-will

+25 vs Fortitude; 3d6 + 5 necrotic damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws (save ends).

Recharge 6 ✦ Healing

Minor

The spine of Vlaakith regains 200 hit points.

The spine of Vlaakith's six soul gems can each hold the soul of one if its victims. At the beginning of an encounter, the soul gems contain two souls. Crushing a gem after the spine is defeated releases the soul back to the Shadowfell.

When the spine of Vlaakith is reduced to 0 hit points or fewer, its spine (but not the soul gems) crumbles into dust, but it is not destroyed. It reappears 1d10 days later within 1 square of its phylactery (in room 15), unless the phylactery is also found and destroyed.

system.biography:
HP 600; Bloodied 300
Regeneration 20 (if the spine of Vlaakith takes radiant damage, regeneration doesn’t function until the end of its next turn)
Resist 10 necrotic, 10 psychic Immune disease, poison, sleep 		Init +13 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 32Fort 32Ref 28Will 33
Speed fly 12 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 16 (+13)
Con 24 (+17)		Dex 16 (+13)
Int 15 (+12)		Wis 17 (+13)
Cha 27 (+18)
Languages Common, Supernal
Alignment Chaotic Evil
Skills Arcana +17, Insight +18, Intimidate +23, Religion +18Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 28
